version_description:
= Important =
* Brand new game looking
* Added Hero system
* Added Team Match mode
* Added Trophy system

= Improvements =
* Fixed game lag of blue team

What's new in 4.1

= Important =
* Added Troops Deck, select 15 troops to fight in battle
* Added troop Beast, light armed
* Added troop Harpy, light armed
* Added switch for classic music
* Added mini map in battle

= Improvements =
* Show & invite friends in private games
* Members check in reward increased to 20 crystals
* optimize UI for watching games

= Balance changes =
* Vampires damage vs armored changed to 28 and damage vs light to 28
* IronKnight damage vs light armored to 30 and damage vs light to 55
* HighLord attack range changed to 1.4

What's new in 4.2

= Important =
* Added new troop Archer, light armored, advantage over light armored.
* Added new troop Dragon, heavy armored advantage over heavy armored.
* Added new hero Scythe.
* Added chest system.
* Added black card to team with friends.
* Added crystal stones, which will transformed to crystals while charging.
* Added invitation & rewards system.

= Improvements =
* Leader board expanded to show 150 players.
* Showing exp needed to next level

What's new in 4.3

= Important =
* Added clan system.
* Added support for Español, Deutsch.
* Added game servers in North America and Southeast Asia.
* Added opening chest with crystal.
* Added Hero Shards, which can be collected to exchange for Heroes.
* Added watching ads to get free gold.

= Improvements =
* Showing anti types in troops info.
* Clicking mini map to move viewing area.

What's new in 4.4

= Important =
* Added clan skills.
* Added hero skills.
* Added support for Français, Indonesia, Italian.
* Added glyphs system.
* Added arena level system.
* Added offline rewards.
* Added novices' rewards.
* Added team cards and speakers for sale in shop.

= Improvements =
* Clear signets when quitting clan.
* Change clan's name.
* Set required trophies to join clan.
* Combine heroes and troops pages.

What's new in 4.5

= Important =
* Added Glyphs composing & decomposing.
* Added training in online mode.
* Added match seasons.

= Improvements =
* Get gold when donating Signets.
* Performance improvements for international players.

What's new in 4.6

= Important =
* Added new troop Mirror Warrior.

= Improvements =
* Show weekly donations in clan.
* Increase daily free Glyphs from 1 to 2.
* Optimized hit effects of Genji's skill.

= Balance changes =
* Zombie's attack speed decreased from 1 to 0.9.
* HeavySword's HP increased from 160 to 169.
* All close-ranged heroes' attack range increased to 3.

What's new in 4.7

= Important =
* Added new troop Wolfman.
* Added glyph page feature.
* Added task system.
* Added daily hero shards.

= Improvements =
* Show season bonus on Leaderboard.
* Optimized account system.

= Balance changes =
* Shadow Warrior's attack speed decreased from 1.9 to 1.8.
